20101213153940.000|20101213153942.000|CCO|THOSE MEALS BY REIMBURSING 
20101213153942.000|20101213153943.667|CCO|SCHOOLS AN ADDITIONAL SIX CENTS

20101213153945.333|20101213153947.000|CCO|HEALTHIER OPTIONS.

20101213153948.667|20101213153950.333|CCO|WAY, IN OVER 30 YEARS.
20101213153950.333|20101213153952.000|CCO|BECAUSE WHEN WE OUR KIDS WALK

20101213153959.143|20101213154000.571|CCO|WE'RE EMPOWERING PARENTS BY 
20101213154000.571|20101213154002.000|CCO|MAKING INFORMATION MORE 
20101213154002.000|20101213154003.429|CCO|AVAILABLE ABOUT THE QUALITY OF

20101213154007.714|20101213154009.143|CCO|DAY.
20101213154009.143|20101213154010.571|CCO|AND TO SUPPORT OUR SCHOOLS' 
20101213154010.571|20101213154012.000|CCO|EFFORTS TO SERVE FRESH FRUITS 
20101213154012.000|20101213154015.333|CCO|AND VEGETABLES WE'RE CONNECTING 
20101213154015.333|20101213154018.667|CCO|THEM WITH LOCAL FERFARMERS.
20101213154018.667|20101213154022.000|CCO|ALSO IMPROVING SAFETY AND 
20101213154022.000|20101213154023.667|CCO|BOOSTING KM EDCOMMOIES LIKE 
20101213154023.667|20101213154025.333|CCO|CHEESE.
20101213154025.333|20101213154027.000|CCO|IT'S ALSO IMPORTANT TO NOTE THAT
20101213154027.000|20101213154028.667|CCO|WHILE THIS BILL IS FULLY PAID
